name: Confetti Betty Couture Natural Oatmeal Brim Hat
description:
Natural oatmeal brim hat with removable Barley flower and golden gem OR you can pick any color flower from my yarn selection.

All hats have my signature Confetti Betty Couture labels and come wrapped and ready for gift giving.

All flowers for babies and toddlers are on alligator clips, so that you can interchange the flowers and also put them on headbands or directly in to the hair.  Buy one hat and lots of flowers to match all your outfits.  Adult flowers will all have brooch pins on the back of the flowers so that you can wear them on clothing as well.  :)

For custom orders, please email me at confettibettycouture@gmail.com

name: Confetti Betty Couture Adult Brim Hat in Barley
description:
Adult brim hat in Barley with removable oatmeal flower.

All flowers are removable, so you can interchange them or wear them on your clothing or scarf.

All hats have my signature Confetti Betty Couture labels and come wrapped and ready for gift giving.

All flowers for babies and toddlers are on alligator clips, so that you can interchange the flowers and also put them on headbands or directly in to the hair.  Buy one hat and lots of flowers to match all your outfits.  Adult flowers will all have brooch pins on the back of the flowers so that you can wear them on clothing as well.  :)
